text.config.minor-audio-inconvenience.op:
Controls if the mod is enabled. 
If disabled, the volume of sounds will not be changed.

Enable or disable the mod. 
If disabled, the volume of sounds will not be changed.

Enable or disable the mod. 
If disabled, the volume of sounds will not be changed. Does not interrupt already playing sounds.

List of sounds with custom volume.
Using the "Add Sounds" menu to add new sounds is recommended.

Format: namespace:id=volume
